meta.title: [prompt] Create SEO-optimized title for the company homepage
meta.description: [prompt] Write compelling meta description for the company's main products and services

hero.title: [prompt] Create powerful hero title that captures the company's core value proposition
hero.subtitle: [prompt] Write engaging subtitle that explains what the company does and who they serve
hero.backgroundVideo: [prompt] Provide video URL showcasing company operations or products
hero.backgroundImage: [prompt] Provide fallback hero image URL that represents the industry or company

cta.primary: [prompt] Create compelling primary call-to-action button text

whyChooseUs.title: [prompt] Create section title that highlights company advantages
whyChooseUs.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle that supports the main advantages theme

items.icon: [prompt] Choose from: award, shield, check-circle, star, thumbs-up, crown, medal, verified
items.title: [prompt] Create advantage title focusing on quality/certification
items.description: [prompt] Explain the quality advantage with specific details like certifications, standards, processes

items.icon: [prompt] Choose from: clock, calendar, history, trending-up, building, users
items.title: [prompt] Create advantage title focusing on experience/expertise
items.description: [prompt] Highlight years of experience, expertise, successful projects, or industry knowledge

items.icon: [prompt] Choose from: cog, settings, cpu, zap, tool, wrench, gear
items.title: [prompt] Create advantage title focusing on technology/capabilities
items.description: [prompt] Describe technological advantages, equipment, processes, or innovation

aboutusintro.title: [prompt] Create about section title that introduces the company
aboutusintro.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle that positions company as industry leader
aboutusintro.description: [prompt] Write compelling company introduction covering mission, vision, and core values
aboutusintro.image: [prompt] Provide image URL showing company facility, team, or operations
highlights: [prompt] Create highlight 2 - product range or capability
[prompt] Create highlight 3 - market reach or clients
[prompt] Create highlight 4 - support or service feature

stats.title: [prompt] Create stats section title showcasing achievements
stats.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle that emphasizes scale and success

items.number: [prompt] Add years of experience number with + sign
items.label: Years Experience

items.number: [prompt] Add product variants number with + sign
items.label: Product Variants

items.number: [prompt] Add countries served number with + sign
items.label: Countries Served

items.number: [prompt] Add satisfied clients number with + sign
items.label: Satisfied Clients

expertise.title: [prompt] Create expertise section title highlighting industry focus
expertise.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle about specialized solutions for different sectors
expertise.description: [prompt] Explain how company serves diverse sectors with specialized products

sectors.name: [prompt] Industry sector name 1
sectors.description: [prompt] Describe products/services for this industry sector

testimonials.title: [prompt] Create testimonials section title
testimonials.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle about client relationships and trust

items.name: [prompt] Client name 1
items.content: [prompt] Write authentic testimonial focusing on quality, service, and results

items.name: [prompt] Client name 2
items.content: [prompt] Write authentic testimonial focusing on partnership and reliability

faqs.title: [prompt] Create FAQ section title
faqs.subtitle: [prompt] Write subtitle about common questions and answers

items.question: [prompt] Create question about minimum order quantity or requirements
items.answer: [prompt] Provide clear answer about ordering minimums and requirements

items.question: [prompt] Create question about delivery times or lead times
items.answer: [prompt] Provide realistic timeframes for different types of orders
